body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! This is George Kelly from Vincenzo's Benzos. How can I assist you today? May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi George, my name is Deborah James. I'm interested in purchasing a car and had a few questions.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Deborah! I'd be happy to help with that. First, could you please provide me with your email address so we can send you some detailed information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is deborahjames at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Deborah. Also, could I have your contact number in case we need to reach you for further inquiries?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. It's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thanks for sharing that, Deborah. Now, what kind of car are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for a sedan, preferably something fuel-efficient with good safety ratings.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We have a few models that might suit your needs. I'll compile some options and send the details to your email shortly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time and for reaching out, Deborah. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is George Kelly and the customer's name is Deborah James.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
